get.description: List the operations for the provider
Lists all of the firmware analysis workspaces in the specified subscription.
Lists all of the firmware analysis workspaces in the specified resource group.

parameters.name: workspaceName
parameters.description: The name of the firmware analysis workspace.

parameters.description: The name of the firmware analysis workspace.

Location.description: The Location header contains the URL where the status of the long running operation can be checked.

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

parameters.description: The Firmware analysis summary name describing the type of summary.

values.name: Firmware

Azure.ResourceManager.CommonTypes.SkuUpd.description: The resource model definition representing SKU

name.description: The name of the SKU. Ex - P3. It is typically a letter+number code

tier.description: This field is required to be implemented by the Resource Provider if the service has more than one tier, but is not required on a PUT.

size.description: The SKU size. When the name field is the combination of tier and some other value, this would be the standalone code.

family.description: If the service has different generations of hardware, for the same SKU, then that can be captured here.

capacity.description: If the SKU supports scale out/in then the capacity integer should be included. If scale out/in is not possible for the resource this may be omitted.

noExecute.description: Flag indicating the binary's stack is set to NX (no-execute).

positionIndependentExecutable.description: Flag indicating the binary was compiled to be a position independent executable.

relocationReadOnly.description: Flag indicating the binary has enabled relocation read-only protections.

canary.description: Flag indicating if the binary was compiled with stack canaries enabled.

stripped.description: Flag indicating if debug symbols have been stripped from the binary.

BinaryHardeningResource.description: The object representing a firmware analysis binary hardening result resource

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

BinaryHardeningResourceListResult.description: The response of a BinaryHardeningResource list operation.

value.description: The BinaryHardeningResource items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

binaryHardeningId.description: ID for the binary hardening result.

securityHardeningFeatures.description: The security hardening features of the binary.

executableArchitecture.description: The architecture of the binary being reported on.

filePath.description: The path to the binary in the firmware.

executableClass.description: The executable class to indicate 32 or 64 bit.

runpath.description: The runpath property of the uploaded binary, which is a method of specifying additional paths to load objects at runtime.

rpath.description: The rpath property of the uploaded binary, which is a deprecated method of specifying additional paths to load objects at runtime.

provisioningState.description: The status of the last operation.

BinaryHardeningSummaryResource.description: Properties for a binary hardening analysis summary.

totalFiles.description: Total number of binaries that were analyzed

notExecutableStackCount.description: Total number of analyzed files that were found to have a nonexecutable stack

positionIndependentExecutableCount.description: Total number of analyzed files that were compiled to be a position independent executable

relocationReadOnlyCount.description: Total number of analyzed files that have enabled relocation read-only protections

stackCanaryCount.description: Total number of analyzed files that have stack canaries enabled

strippedBinaryCount.description: Total number of analyzed files that have debug symbols stripped

CertificateUsage.description: Activities for which the cryptographic certificate can be used.

values.name: DigitalSignature
values.description: This certificate can be used to add a signature to a message

values.name: NonRepudiation
values.description: This certificates provides a non-repudiation service that protects against false denial of a message

values.name: ContentCommitment
values.description: A synonym for NonRepudiation used in newer x509 certificates

values.name: KeyEncipherment
values.description: This certificate can be used to encrypt a private or secret key

values.name: DataEncipherment
values.description: This certificate can be used to decrypt a private or secret key

values.name: KeyAgreement
values.description: This certificate can be used to perform a key agreement, such as with a Diffie-Hellman key exchange

values.name: KeyCertSign
values.description: This certificate can be used to verify a other public keys

values.name: CRLSign
values.description: This certificate can be used to verify a certificate revocation list

values.name: EncipherOnly
values.description: This certificate can be only be used to encrypt data

values.name: DecipherOnly
values.description: This certificate can only be used to decrypt data

values.name: ServerAuthentication
values.description: This certificate can be used to authenticate a server in a TLS/SSL connection

values.name: ClientAuthentication
values.description: This certificate can be used to authenticate a client in a TLS/SSL connection

values.name: CodeSigning
values.description: This certificate can be used to authenticate a code object

values.name: EmailProtection
values.description: This certificate can be used to authenticate an email address

values.name: TimeStamping
values.description: This certificate binds the hash of an object to a time

values.name: OCSPSigning
values.description: This certificate can be used to sign OCSP responses

certificateRole.description: Role of the certificate (Root CA, etc)

signatureAlgorithm.description: The signature algorithm used in the certificate.

certificateKeySize.description: Size of the certificate's key in bits

certificateKeyAlgorithm.description: Key algorithm used in the certificate.

certificateUsage.description: List of functions the certificate can fulfill.

filePaths.description: List of files where this certificate was found.

isExpired.description: Indicates if the certificate is expired.

isSelfSigned.description: Indicates if the certificate is self-signed.

isWeakSignature.description: Indicates the signature algorithm used is insecure according to NIST guidance.

isShortKeySize.description: Indicates the certificate's key size is considered too small to be secure for the key algorithm according to NIST guidance.

provisioningState.description: The status of the last operation.

CryptoCertificateEntity.description: Information on an entity (distinguished name) in a cryptographic certificate.

commonName.description: Common name of the certificate entity.

organizationalUnit.description: The organizational unit of the certificate entity.

state.description: Geographical state or province of the certificate entity.

country.description: Country code of the certificate entity.

CryptoCertificateResource.description: The object representing a firmware analysis crypto certificate resource

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

CryptoCertificateResourceListResult.description: The response of a CryptoCertificateResource list operation.

value.description: The CryptoCertificateResource items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

pairedKeyCount.description: Total number of paired private keys found for the certificates.

expiredCertificateCount.description: Total number of expired certificates found.

expiringSoonCertificateCount.description: Total number of nearly expired certificates found.

weakSignatureCount.description: Total number of certificates found using a weak signature algorithm.

selfSignedCertificateCount.description: Total number of certificates found that are self-signed.

shortKeySizeCount.description: Total number of certificates found that have an insecure key size for the key algorithm.

keyType.description: Type of the key (public or private).

cryptoKeySize.description: Size of the key in bits.

filePaths.description: List of files where this key was found.

pairedKey.description: A matching paired key or certificate.

isShortKeySize.description: Indicates the key size is considered too small to be secure for the algorithm according to NIST guidance.

provisioningState.description: The status of the last operation.

CryptoKeyResource.description: The object representing a firmware analysis crypto key resource

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

CryptoKeyResourceListResult.description: The response of a CryptoKeyResource list operation.

value.description: The CryptoKeyResource items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

totalKeyCount.description: Total number of cryptographic keys found.

publicKeyCount.description: Total number of (non-certificate) public keys found.

privateKeyCount.description: Total number of private keys found.

pairedKeyCount.description: Total number of keys found that have a matching paired key or certificate.

shortKeySizeCount.description: Total number of keys found that have an insecure key size for the algorithm.

values.name: Public
values.description: The key is an asymmetric public key.

values.name: Private
values.description: The key is an asymmetric private key.

CveComponent.description: Legacy component of a CVE result.

CveLink.description: Properties of a reference link for a CVE.

href.description: The destination of the reference link.

label.description: The label of the reference link.

CveResource.description: The object representing a firmware analysis CVE result resource

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

CveResourceListResult.description: The response of a CveResource list operation.

value.description: The CveResource items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

CveResult.description: Details of a CVE detected in firmware.

componentId.description: ID of the affected SBOM component.

componentName.description: Name of the affected SBOM component.

componentVersion.description: Version of the affected SBOM component.

component.description: Legacy property for what is now componentName

cvssScore.description: Legacy property for the effective CVE score.

cvssV2Score.description: Legacy property for the CVE CVSS version 2 score, if one existed.

cvssV3Score.description: Legacy property for the CVE CVSS version 3 score, if one existed.

cvssVersion.description: Legacy property for the what CVSS version score was stored in the cvssScore property

effectiveCvssScore.description: The most recent CVSS score of the CVE.

effectiveCvssVersion.description: The version of the effectiveCvssScore property.

cvssScores.description: All known CVSS scores for the CVE.

links.description: The list of reference links for the CVE.

provisioningState.description: The status of the last operation.

CveSummary.description: Properties for a CVE analysis summary.

criticalCveCount.description: The total number of critical severity CVEs detected

highCveCount.description: The total number of high severity CVEs detected

mediumCveCount.description: The total number of medium severity CVEs detected

lowCveCount.description: The total number of low severity CVEs detected

unknownCveCount.description: The total number of unknown severity CVEs detected

version.description: The version of the Common Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS).

score.description: The score of the CVE according to the CVSS specified.

ExecutableClass.description: String to indicate if the executable is 32 or 64 bit.

values.name: x86
values.description: The binary is 32-bit.

values.name: x64
values.description: The binary is 64-bit.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

FirmwareListResult.description: The response of a Firmware list operation.

value.description: The Firmware items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

fileName.description: File name for a firmware that user uploaded.

fileSize.description: File size of the uploaded firmware image.

statusMessages.description: A list of errors or other messages generated during firmware analysis

FirmwareSummary.description: Properties for high level summary of firmware analysis results.

extractedSize.description: Total extracted size of the firmware in bytes.

rootFileSystems.description: The number of root file systems found.

properties.description: The editable properties of a firmware

GenerateUploadUrlRequest.description: Properties for generating an upload URL

firmwareId.description: A unique ID for the firmware to be uploaded.

PairedKey.description: Details of a matching paired key or certificate.

pairedKeyId.description: ID of the paired key or certificate.

type.description: The type indicating whether the paired object is a key or certificate.

filePath.description: File path of the password hash

provisioningState.description: The status of the last operation.

PasswordHashResource.description: The object representing a firmware analysis password hash result resource

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

PasswordHashResourceListResult.description: The response of a PasswordHashResource list operation.

value.description: The PasswordHashResource items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

ProvisioningState.description: The status of a firmware analysis job.

values.name: Succeeded
values.description: The request has successfully completed.

values.name: Failed
values.description: There was an error during the request.

values.name: Canceled
values.description: The request was canceled.

values.name: Pending
values.description: The request is queued and awaiting execution

values.name: Extracting
values.description: The Firmware is currently being extracted.

values.name: Analyzing
values.description: Analysis is being run on the firmware

filePaths.description: File paths related to the component. Note, relatedFiles should be used instead of this property.

provisioningState.description: The status of the last operation.

value.description: The SbomComponentResource items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

Status.description: The status of a firmware analysis job.

values.name: Pending
values.description: The analysis job is queued

values.name: Extracting
values.description: The firmware is currently being extracted

values.name: Analyzing
values.description: Analysis is being run on the firmware

values.name: Ready
values.description: Analysis job results are ready

values.name: Error
values.description: An error occurred while running firmware analysis
